title.narrative: Enabling activities to review and update the national implementation plan for the Stockholm Convention on Persistent Organic Pollutants

description.narrative: The overall goal of the EA is to fulfill the country#s obligation under Article 7 of the Stockholm Convention which is to review and update the NIP and submit it to the COP within two years the amendments enter into force (August 2012). The activities of the proposed EA will fill the gaps required to review and update the NIP. This will include: i) strengthening the national coordination mechansim by involving additional stakeholders on new POPs; ii) establishing working groups with expertise on new POPs; iii) updating and reviewing the original 12 POPs; iv) conducting a basic inventory of new POPs; v) assessing the regulatory and policy framework and institutional capacities to manage new POPs, and vi) prioritizing and drafting relevant objectives and action plans for reducing and phasing out new POPs. Relevant stakeholders will be consulted and engaged throughout the project implementation process. The updated, endorsed and submitted NIP will provide a basis for identifying activities to be implement as post-NIP projects, in accordance with the requirements of the Stockholm Convention.
